item.title: Sun Blade 150 Setup and
item.description: Iâ€™ve had this Sun Blade 150 workstation in my possession for a few months, having gotten it from a friend who was offloading some tech he no longer used nor wanted. Today, I finally decided to get it set up and fully operational. My first attempt at powering this machine on (shortly after I got it) resulted in the monitor coming on for a couple seconds, displaying an error saying there was no keyboard attached, and then shutting off.

item.title: Bexitor
item.description: Bexitor (short for Basic Text Editor) is a simple, fast, lightweight, free, and open-source text editor for Windows, similar to Notepad, except with more features. It works on Windows XP and up (.net Framework 4.0 or newer is required.) I originally wrote Bexitor to learn Visual Basic, but it's turned into more of a continued project, and I would consider it "completed" currently. New versions, however, are released semi-regularly. Bexitor has .

item.title: Software
item.description: Bexitor (short for Basic Text Editor) is a text editor for Windows that I wrote to learn Visual Basic. For more information, screenshots, and downloads, visit Bexitor's website.
